1: <pb/>Yic xlajw yaln Jesús jun tzo'n̈ chi 'a eb' 'anma', xyaln 'ixtc 'a eb' scuywum:
2: <pb/>—Eyojtac to chab'joc xoj yoch q'uin̈ yic snanb'il cot yel eb' qui mam quichmec 'a libre, an 'Ochnc in 'Anmal tic, 'oj wajx 'och 'a yol sc'ab' eb' 'oj wa'n 'och 'a spenc culus, xchi 'a eb'.
3: <pb/>Ax eb' sat ya'mal 'och sti eb' 'anma 'a Dios, yet' eb' cuywjum 'a ley yic Moisés, yet' eb' 'ichmtac winac, syam sb'a eb' 'a yamq'uil yatut win Caifás. A win cha, sat ya'mal 'och sti eb' 'anma 'a Dios.
4: Ata xlaj yal eb', tas 'oj yutc eb' ya'n 'och 'es 'a yib'n̈ Jesús, sec tzyamchj yuj eb', tzmiln eb'.
5: Palta xyaln eb' 'ixtic: <pb/>—Matz tac' qui yamnec 'a yol q'uin̈, yujto 'ay smay 'oj yac' eb' 'anma yowlal 'ayn̈ec, xchi eb'.
6: <pb/>Ax Jesús, 'ix c'och 'a Betania, axta 'ix 'och wan 'a yatut Simón, a 'a yic yalan̈, ya'ay win yuj jun yab'il lepra sb'i.
7: A yic wocn 'ejm Jesús swa'i, 'ix c'och jun 'ix 'a 'a, yet' 'ix jun q'uen limita b'onc 'a q'uen alabastro<f>[37]</f> sb'i. B'ut'n q'uen yet' jun su'q'ui sjab' caw chan̈ stojol. 'Ix stob'n q'ue 'ix jun chi 'a sjolm Jesús.
8: Ax xyiln eb' scuywum jun cha, xcot yowl eb' 'a 'ix, 'ix laj yal-lanc eb' 'ixtic: <pb/>—¿Tas yuj nab'a tz'ixtx jun tic?
9: A jun su'q'ui sjab' tic, caw chan̈ stojol, octom xchon̈xi, ax 'a eb' meb'a x'ajx stojol, xchi eb'.
10: <pb/>Ax yic xyab'n Jesús jun tzo'n̈ cha, 'ix yaln 'ixtc 'a eb': <pb/>—¿Tas yuj tu tzeyal 'a 'ix? A jun tzb'o 'ix 'ayn tic, caw wach'.
11: A eb' meb'a xeyal cha, 'ayc'n̈ej eb' eyet'oc, palta an xo tic, man̈ in 'ayc 'ec'n̈ej eyet'oc.
12: 'Aycto xya'n 'och 'ix jun su'q'ui sjab' 'a in niwnal tic, sec wach' lista xo waji ax in mucxi.
13: Wal yel tzwal 'ayex, tzann̈j lugar 'a yolyib'n̈q'uinl tic 'aj 'oj alxc 'el wach' ab'x yic colnb'il, 'oj alxc pax 'el yab'xil tas 'ix sb'o jun 'ix tic, yic 'oj naxc cot 'ix, xchi 'a eb'.
14: <pb/>'Ay jun scuywum Jesús 'a scal eb' lajchwa'an̈, atn Judas win 'aj Queriot, 'ix 'at sc'umc sb'a yet' ewin sat ya'mal 'och sti eb' 'anma 'a Dios,
15: 'ix yaln 'a ewin 'ixtic: <pb/>—Toto 'oj wa'ch Jesús 'a yol e c'ab', ¿jantc tzin e tojo? xchi 'a ewinac. <pb/>Yuj cha, xya'n ewin 30 q'uen tumn plata<f>[38]</f> 'a 'a.
16: Wal 'a jun c'u cha, syamn 'och win sayn wal tas tzyutj ya'n 'och Jesús 'a yol sc'ab' ewinac.
17: <pb/>A 'a b'ab'l c'u yic jun q'uin̈ tzwax 'ixm pan may yich, 'ix jaw eb' scuywum Jesús 'a 'a, 'ix sc'anb'n eb' 'a 'ixtic: <pb/>—¿'Ajtil tza nib'j tzqui b'o 'aj tzon̈ wa'ec, yic tzqui nanec cot yic yel eb' qui mam quichmec 'a libre? xchi eb' 'a 'a.
18: <pb/>—'Ixquec 'a chon̈ab', ata tzex c'och 'a yatut jun winac, tzeyal 'ixtc 'a 'a: Xchi qui cuymal on̈, to jab'xoj wal tiempo 'ayq'ui, yuj cha, xyalni to a 'a jun atut tic 'oj wa quet' an̈ scuywum on̈ tic on̈, yic tzqui nan cot yel eb' qui mam quichmec 'a libre, xe chi 'a winac, xchi Jesús 'a eb'.
19: <pb/>Sb'on eb' scuywum Jesús 'icha wal xyutj yaln cha. 'Ix sb'on eb' tas 'oj sc'ux 'a yic jun q'uin̈ cha.
20: <pb/>Ax 'a sq'uic'b'alil, 'ix 'em wocn yet' eb' scuywum cha.
21: Yic wan swa yet' eb', 'ix yaln 'ixtic: <pb/>—Wal yel tzwal 'ayex, 'ay jun 'a qui calc tic, a 'oj wa'n 'och 'a yol sc'ab' chamel, xchi 'a eb'.
22: <pb/>Caw xcus eb' yab'n jun cha, yuj cha, junjnal 'ix sc'anb'j eb' yab' 'ixtc 'a 'a: <pb/>—Mamin ¿man̈ inoc am an tic? xchi junjn eb' 'a 'a.
23: <pb/>Yuj cha, xyaln 'a eb' 'ixtic: <pb/>—A jun wan swa wet' a jun plato 'ayc' a qui nan̈lec tic, a 'oj wa'n 'och 'a yol sc'ab' chamel.
24: An tic 'Ochnc in 'Anma'il, palta yowlal 'oj in 'at 'a chamel, 'icha yaj stz'ib'x can 'a Ch'an̈ U'un̈; palta caw 'oltac jun 'oj wa'n 'och 'a yol sc'ab' chaml cha. Octom ma'ix 'alj winac, to 'ixta', yel xo wach' yic winac, xchi 'a eb'.
25: <pb/>Ax win Judas, 'oj 'a'nc 'och Jesús 'a yol sc'ab' chaml cha, 'ix yaln win 'ixtc 'a 'a: <pb/>—Ach in Cuymal, ¿man̈ inoc am an tic? xchi 'a 'a. <pb/>—Ach ton tic, xchi 'a winac.
26: <pb/>Yic wan swa Jesús yet' eb' scuywum cha, 'ix yi'n chan̈ 'ixm pan, 'ix ya'n yuj diosal yuj 'ixim, xlajwn̈ej cha, 'ix sch'iyn 'ixm pan cha, 'ix xya'n 'a eb' scuywum cha. <pb/>—Wan̈ec, a jun tic in niwnal, xchi 'a eb'.
27: <pb/>Xlajw cha, 'ix sb'utn jun vaso, 'ix ya'n yuj diosal 'a Dios yu'uj, 'ix ya'n pax 'a eb', xyaln 'ixtic: <pb/>—Mol 'u'jec jun tic e masnil.
28: Yujto a jun tic in chiq'uil. Yuj in chic'l tic, 'oj 'el'choc jun strato Dios<f>[39]</f> tzat yac' 'ayex. 'Oj 'elcn in chic'l tic, sec wach' til wal mach 'oj 'ajxoc can lajwc smul yu'uj.
29: Palta tzwalcn 'ayx ticnec, man̈x 'a junc yal uva 'oj wuc', masnto 'a jun c'u 'oj wuc' jun yal uva 'a't eyet'oc, at 'a yic 'oj 'och qui Mamc Yajlil, xchi 'a eb'.
30: <pb/>Xlajw sb'itnan eb' jun b'it<f>[40]</f> 'a Dios, x'elt eb', 'ix 'at eb' 'a tzaln Olivo.
31: Ata xyal Jesús 'ixtc 'a eb': <pb/>—A 'a jun 'ac'wl tic, c'uxn 'oj somchjoc 'el e nab'en wu'uj. Yujto 'ixtc yaj stz'ib'x can 'a Ch'an̈ U'un̈: ¡'Oj wac' milxc cham jun 'icha yilmal in calnelu yaji, ax eb' 'icha in calnelu cha, 'oj sactzic can 'at eb'! xchi.
32: Palta ax yic 'oj in pitzw paxi, 'oj in b'ab'l c'och eyuj 'a Galilea, xchi 'a eb'.
33: <pb/>Ax Pedro 'ix aln 'ixtc 'a 'a: <pb/>—Wach'xam c'uxn 'oj somchjc 'el snab'en eb' tic, palta an tic, may b'a'n̈ 'oj somchjc 'el in nab'en, xchi 'a 'a.
34: <pb/>—Wal yel tzwal 'ayach, a 'a jun 'ac'wl tic, yic mantzac 'oc' no 'ajtzo', 'ox 'ejm 'oj e'l 'a eb'an̈, chajtlto man̈ in 'ojcoc, xchi Jesús 'a 'a.
35: <pb/>—Wach'xam 'oj in milx cham et'oc, toxn ma'oj wala', to man̈ ach wojoc, xchi Pedro cha. <pb/>An̈jtona', 'ixta xyutj eb' scuywum chi yaln smasnil.
36: <pb/>Xlajw cha, xc'och Jesús yet' eb' scuywum 'a jun lugar Getsemaní sb'i, ata xyal 'a eb' 'ixtic: <pb/>—Cann̈ec 'a tic, to 'oj in 'at leslwoc 'a cha, xchi 'a eb'.
37: <pb/>Xlajw cha, xyi'n 'at Pedro yet' eb' yunnal Zebedeo schawn̈il yet'oc, 'ix syamn 'och scusi, caw 'ix 'och pitz'n cuslal 'a spixan.
38: Yuj cha, xyaln 'ixtc 'a eb': <pb/>—'Ijn wal tzin cham yuj cusc'ojlal, cann̈ec 'a tic. Pitzn ex cab' wet'oc, xchi 'a eb'.
39: <pb/>Xlajw cha, 'ix 'at jab'xo, 'ix 'em lachn 'a sat lu'um, 'ix leslwi 'ixtic: Mamin, 'ij 'ec' jun yailal tic 'a wib'an̈, toto tztac' tza na'a; palta man̈ 'ichaoc tzin nib'j an tic, 'icha cab' tas tza nib'ej, xchi.
40: <pb/>Xlajw cha, xjab'x 'a eb' 'oxwn̈ cha, palta xyilni to waync eb', yuj cha, xyaln 'a Pedro 'ixtic: <pb/>—¿Tom matz tac' tze pitzl e wayn̈ wet' junc hora?
41: Pitzc 'el e wayan̈, leslwan̈ec, sec toq'ue ma'oj eyajx prowal. A qui pixan te'n toni, palta ax qui niwnal may ste'nal, xchi 'a eb'.
42: <pb/>Xlajw cha, x'atx leslwoc jun 'ejm xo, xyaln 'ixtic: Mamin, toto matz tac' yec' jun yailal tic 'a wib'an̈, b'o cab' 'icha tza nib'ej, xchi.
43: <pb/>Yic 'ix jab'x jun 'ejm xo, ax xyilni waync pax eb' scuywum cha, yujto matz caw techj wayn̈ yuj eb'.
44: Yuj cha, xcanx eb' yu'uj, 'ix 'atx leslwoc 'a yox 'ejmal. 'Ix leslwi 'icha wal xleslwi 'a b'ab'el.
45: Yic 'ix jab'x 'a eb' scuywum cha, 'ix yaln 'ixtc 'a eb': <pb/>—¿Tom an̈ja caw waync ex? ¿Tom ton̈j tzex comn 'ilji? A ticnec, xc'och yorail wajx 'och an 'Ochnc in 'Anmal tic 'a yol sc'ab' ewin maysch'olnil.
46: Q'uen̈ec wa'an, coyec. Wan sjaw win tzin 'a'n 'och 'a yol sc'ab' ewin 'ajc'ojol, xchi 'a eb'.
47: <pb/>Wanto yaln jun cha, 'ix jaw win Judas. A win cha, yit cuywumal sb'a cob' yet' eb' uxlchwa'an̈, til wal 'anma xjaw yet' winac, yet' eb' smachit, yet' eb' ste'. 'Ix checx 'at eb' yuj ewin sat ya'mal 'och sti eb' 'anma 'a Dios, yet' ewin 'ichmtac winc 'ay yopiso.
48: A win Judas cha, xyal win 'a eb' tas 'oj yutc sch'oxni, 'ix yaln win 'ixtic: <pb/>—A jun 'oj in tz'ub' 'elt sti', atn jun chi tzeyama, xchi win 'a eb'.
49: Yuj cha, a 'a Jesús ata xc'och win muc'uc, 'ix yaln win 'ixtc 'a 'a: <pb/>—Buenas noche ach in Cuymal, xchi cob' win 'a 'a. Xlajwn̈ej cha, 'ix stz'ub'n 'elt win sti'.
50: 'Ix yaln Jesús 'ixtc 'a winac: <pb/>—Ach in wach'c'ojol, ¿tas yuj tzach jaw 'ayin? xchi 'a winac. Axn wal cha, xc'och ewin mu'c 'a Jesús, syamn ewinac, caw sin̈n̈i xyutj ewin sjalni.
51: <pb/>Palta 'ay jun ajun yet' Jesús, 'ix stza'n q'uet smachit muc'uc, 'ix stzu'n 'el schicn jun smoso win sat ya'mal 'och sti eb' 'anma 'a Dios cha.
52: Yuj cha, xyaln Jesús 'a jun ajun yet' chi 'ixtic: <pb/>—'Ac' 'ejm a machit chi 'a yol yatut. Yujto a mach tz'a'n owl yet' q'uen machit, a q'uen machit chi 'oj milnc pax cham jun xo.
53: ¿Tom man̈ ojcoc, toto tzin nib'j tzin c'an 'a qui Mam Dios, 'ec'b'al 72 mil eb' ángel<f>[41]</f> 'oj yac' cot in wul colnc muc'uc?
54: Palta toto 'oj in c'an 'ixta', ma'oj 'el'choc tas tz'ib'b'il can 'a Ch'an̈ U'un̈. Yujto tz'ib'b'il can ta', to yowlal 'ixtc 'oj waji, xchi 'a 'a.
55: <pb/>Xlajw cha, xyaln pax 'ixtc 'a ewin xc'och cha: <pb/>—¿Tom 'elc'm in tzeyila, yuj cha, eyet' e machit, eyet' e te', tzex jaw wul in eyama'? Junjn c'u tzin 'em wocn cuywjoc 'ayx 'a yamq'uil yatut Dios, palta ma'in eyam ta'.
56: Palta 'ixtn tic tz'aji, sec tz'el'ch tas tz'ib'b'il can yuj eb' schecb' Dios 'a Ch'an̈ U'un̈, xchi 'a ewinac. <pb/>Ax eb' scuywum cha, xyactj can eb' sch'ocoj, 'ix 'at eb' 'elc smasnil.
57: <pb/>Ax ewin xyamn Jesús cha, 'ix yij 'at ewin 'a win Caifás, atn win sat ya'mal 'och sti eb' 'anma 'a Dios. Ata 'ix syam sb'a eb' cuywum 'a ley yic Moisés yet' ewin 'ichmtac winc 'ay yopiso.
58: Ax Pedro, najt tza'n s'at yu'uj, 'ix 'ochch 'a yamq'uil yatut win sat yaj 'a ewin cha. 'Ix 'em wocn yet' eb' policía, sec tzyila tas wal tz'aji.
59: <pb/>Ax ewin sat ya'mal 'och sti eb' 'anma cha, yet' ewin 'ichmtac winac, yet' smasnil ewin sat yajal, 'ix say ewin jun tzo'n̈ stestigo tz'a'n 'och junc 'es 'a yib'n̈ Jesús, sec tzya'ch ewin 'a yol sc'ab' chamel.
60: Til wal eb' xc'ochi, 'ix ya'n 'och eb' jun tzo'n̈ 'es 'a yib'an̈. Palta may junc eb' 'ix 'och tas 'ix yala, c'ojnc'ojnilt 'ix q'ue wan chawn̈ xo eb' testigo chi x'a'n 'och wal 'es 'a yib'an̈,
61: 'ix yaln eb' 'ixtic: <pb/>—'Ix cab' yaln win 'ixtc on̈: An tic tztac' in satn 'el yatut Dios, ax 'a schab'jial, ax sb'ox sjel wu'uj, xchi winac, xchi eb'.
62: <pb/>Ax win sat ya'mal 'och sti eb' 'anma cha, 'ix q'ue wa'an, 'ix yaln win 'ixtc 'a Jesús: <pb/>—¿Tom matz ach ta'w jab'oc? ¿Tom matz ab' xon jun tzo'n̈ tzya'ch ewin tic 'a eb'an̈? xchi win 'a 'a.
63: <pb/>Palta caw sictacn̈ej yaji. Yuj cha, xyaln pax win 'ixtc 'a 'a: <pb/>—Al 'ayn̈ on̈ toto Cristo ach, toto yel yunnalch Dios, yowlal tzal 'a sat Dios pitzan, xchi win 'a 'a.
64: <pb/>—An ton 'icha tzal tic. Tzwal pax 'ayex, to an 'Ochnc in 'Anmal tic, 'oj in eyila', wocn in 'ejm 'a swach' c'ab' Dios, atn jun niwn spoder, 'oj eyil pax weml 'a scal 'asn 'a satcha'an̈, xchi.
65: <pb/>Yic 'ix yab'n win yajl chi jun tzo'n̈ cha, caw 'ix stziljat<f>[42]</f> win spichl scot yowal, 'ix yaln win 'ixtc 'a ewin yit yajlil cha: <pb/>—A jun winc tic, caw tzb'uchwj 'a Dios, man̈x 'a yopiso eb' testigo yujto tzcab'c sb'uchwj 'a Dios.
66: ¿Tas xe chi yuj winac? xchi winac. <pb/>—Caw x'och smul winac, smoj tzcham winac, xchi eb' 'anma cha.
67: <pb/>Xlajw cha, 'ix stzub'n 'och eb' stzub' 'a sat Jesús, 'ix smac' pax eb'. 'Ay pax eb' xpawn 'och sc'ab' 'a sti',
68: xyaln eb' 'ixtc 'a 'a: <pb/>—Toto cob' Cristo ach, ala mach tzach ma'n tzab'i, xchi eb' 'a 'a.
69: <pb/>Ax Pedro, 'ayt 'ec' 'a yamq'uil jun n̈a cha, 'ix c'och jun 'ix ya'mal servil ewin 'a 'a. <pb/>—Ach tic etb'eym a b'a yet' Jesús 'aj Galilea, xchi 'ix 'a 'a.
70: <pb/>Palta 'ix yij 'el 'a yib'an̈, 'ix slocn sb'i Dios: <pb/>A jun tzal 'ayn tic, man̈ wojcoc xoni, xchi 'a 'ix.
71: <pb/>Ax yic wan yel'ch Pedro 'a sti n̈a cha, xyiln jun 'ix 'ix yel'chi, xyaln 'ix 'a jun tzo'n̈ xo eb' 'ixtic. <pb/>—Atn jun winc tic, yitb'eym sb'a yet' Jesús 'aj Galilea, xchi 'ix.
72: <pb/>Palta 'ix yij pax 'el 'a yib'n̈ jun 'ejm xo, 'ix slocn sb'i Dios. <pb/>—Caw man̈ wojcoc jun winc cha, xchi 'a eb'.
73: <pb/>Ax 'a yic jun rato cha, 'ix c'och eb' 'ayc' xon chi 'a stz'ey Pedro cha, 'ix yaln eb' 'ixtc 'a 'a: <pb/>—Wal yel etb'eym a b'a yet' eb' scuywum Jesús, yujto lajn a paxtin yet' eb' tzcab' on̈, xchi eb' 'a 'a.
74: <pb/>Ax yic xlajw yaln eb' winc cha, 'ix sc'ann cot Pedro chi yowl sc'ojl Dios 'a yib'an̈, 'ix slocn sb'i Dios: <pb/>—A jun winc cha, caw man̈ wojcoc, xchi 'a eb', at wal slajw yaln jun cha, 'ix 'oc' no 'ajtzo'.
75: Yuj cha, 'ix snan cot Pedro tas yaljnac Jesús 'a 'a, yic yaln 'ixtic: Yic mantzac 'oc' no 'ajtzo', 'ox 'ejm 'oj e'l 'a eb'an̈, chajtlto man̈ in ojcoc, xchi Jesús 'a 'a. Yuj cha, yajn̈ej 'ix 'elt Pedro cha, syamn 'och wal yoc' si'mb'il.
